title: FS/FT - T206 Fred Beck Fielding SGC 30
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS/FT - T206 Fred Beck Fielding SGC 30
posts.post_content:
T206 Fred Beck Fielding SGC 30.  Piedmont 350 back.  Nice card, clean and very well centered as shown in the scans - crease in lower right is what drew the 30 grade.  $28 delivered, Paypal preferred (gift if possible), check or MO.  PM or email.  

Thanks for looking!
